Dependency Licenses
-------------------

* bower-license
  URL: https://github.com/AceMetrix/bower-license#readme
  Version: <%- pkgs['bower-license'].version %>
  License: Apache-2.0
  Description: Generates a list of bower dependencies for a project

* lodash
  URL: https://lodash.com/
  Version: <%- pkgs['lodash'].version %>
  License: MIT
  Description: Lodash modular utilities.

* minimist
  URL: https://github.com/substack/minimist
  Version: <%- pkgs['minimist'].version %>
  License: MIT
  Description: parse argument options

* nlf
  URL: https://github.com/iandotkelly/nlf
  Version: <%- pkgs['nlf'].version %>
  License: MIT
  Description: Find licenses for a node application and its node_module dependencies

* spdx-correct
  URL: https://github.com/kemitchell/spdx-correct.js#readme
  Version: <%- pkgs['spdx-correct'].version %>
  License: Apache-2.0
  Description: correct invalid SPDX identifiers
